mapper.select: SELECT course.title, course.price, description.description, s1.title oneSubject, s2.title twoSubject, teacher.`name` teacherName FROM edu_course course LEFT JOIN edu_course_description description ON course.id = description.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON course.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON course.subject_id = s2.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher teacher ON course.teacher_id = teacher.id WHERE course.id = #{courseId}
